body: This PR adds support for https://github.com/kirides/DaedalusLanguageServer used by Gothic and Gothic II games. Please let me know if the `root_dir` was added correctly as I'm not sure if it's equivalent of steps described in README of mentioned repo.

comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+local util = require 'lspconfig.util'
+local bin_name = 'DaedalusLanguageServer'
+
+if vim.fn.has 'win32' == 1 then
+  bin_name = bin_name + '.exe'
+end

comment_data.body: also, if this line were kept, the operator is wrong (should be `..`)
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+local util = require 'lspconfig.util'
+local bin_name = 'DaedalusLanguageServer'
+
+if vim.fn.has 'win32' == 1 then
+  bin_name = bin_name + '.exe'
+end

comment_data.body: May I ask why should I remove it? I've checked some servers configs in repo and they had that. Or is it automatic now?
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+local util = require 'lspconfig.util'
+local bin_name = 'DaedalusLanguageServer'
+
+if vim.fn.has 'win32' == 1 then
+  bin_name = bin_name + '.exe'

comment_data.body: I'm not sure what the request is but I guess I should add a newline between right? If yes then why you call it like that?

comment_data.body: oh I see. they are also should be removed i will do it later. we use exepath to find server executable so no need it now

comment_data.body: I mean can just in cmd after win32 condition removed.
Of course! I didn't see it since you highlighted those 2 lines together :D Fixed.

title: feat: add daedalus-language-server support
